  • Trusted expertise from a seasoned team ensures tailored solutions and smoother client experiences.
  • Nationwide reach across 25+ states (and growing) supports local and relocation-based transactions.

If you’ve ever wished the mortgage process was easier for your clients (and for you!), Success Lending eXp makes that happen. Created exclusively for eXp Realty agents, Success Lending offers an in-house lending platform that streamlines home financing from start to finish.

Success Lending eXp gives you an edge with personalized loan options, competitive rates, and lightning-fast communication—all designed to help you close more deals, faster. Your clients get a smooth, transparent lending experience, and you get to be their hero. Let us explain how. Here’s your handy dandy index:

What Is Success Lending eXp?

Success Lending is a game-changing mortgage platform built for eXp Realty agents and their clients. Launched in 2021 joint venture with Kind Lending, it offers a full suite of residential mortgage solutions, delivered through innovative technology and top-notch support.

This isn’t just another lender. Success Lending integrates seamlessly with the eXp Realty platform, giving agents and clients a faster, easier, and more flexible home financing experience. For eXp agents, Success Lending is just one part of eXp Solutions for agents to help their clients.

Overview of Mortgage Solutions at Success Lending eXp

Success Lending eXp offers a wide variety of loan programs designed to meet the needs of nearly any homebuyer. Their lineup includes:

  • Conventional Loans
  • VA Loans
  • FHA Loans
  • First-Time Homebuyer Programs
  • Jumbo Loans
  • …and more.

With an easy-to-use digital application process, your clients can breeze through the paperwork and stay in the loop with real-time updates. Success Lending eXp matches each client with the right loan for their needs—keeping long-term financial health in mind. It’s the kind of mortgage experience that makes YOU the hero of their homebuying journey.

Where Does Success Lending Operate?

Success Lending eXp operates in multiple states—and they’re expanding quickly! States like: Alabama, Arizona, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Maryland, Michigan, Minnesota, Nebraska, New Jersey, North Carolina, Ohio, Oklahoma, Oregon, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Tennessee, Texas, West Virginia, and Wisconsin. Whether your client is buying locally or relocating across state lines, this lender has the regional expertise to navigate state-specific regulations and deliver proven mortgage solutions. They’re here to help you and your clients get to the closing table—no matter where “home” happens to be.

Leadership and Team Expertise

Success Lending eXp is powered by an all-star team of seasoned mortgage professionals. These are the folks who know how to navigate complex lending situations and make them feel easy. Their collaborative culture and commitment to ongoing training mean your clients will work with loan officers who are sharp, responsive, and genuinely invested in their success. It’s the kind of team you want in your corner.

The Power Duo: eXp Realty + Success Lending

When two powerhouses join forces, big things happen. That’s exactly what you get with the strategic partnership between eXp Realty and Success Lending. Together, they’re transforming how real estate agents support their clients—making the home-buying and financing experience smoother, faster, and less stressful.

This isn’t just about streamlining the mortgage process (although that’s a huge win). It’s about giving eXp Realty agents an edge in today’s competitive market. By teaming up with Success Lending eXp, agents can offer their clients an all-in-one solution that simplifies everything from showing the home to closing the loan.

And because both companies are built on innovation, transparency, and service, clients get a better experience at every step. This partnership isn’t just raising the bar—it’s resetting the standard for what real estate and mortgage services should be.

How the Success Lending eXp Partnership Benefits Real Estate Agents

For eXp Realty agents, working with Success Lending is like unlocking a new level of service (and opportunity!). Here’s how it helps:

  • Exclusive Access to Competitive Rates & Loan Programs: Agents can offer clients attractive mortgage rates and flexible loan options that are often only available through Success Lending eXp.
  • An Instant Credibility Boost: Partnering with a trusted, national mortgage lender builds buyer confidence—and makes you the hero of their home-buying story.
  • Tools That Make You Look Like a Pro: From loan calculators to personalized support, Success Lending equips agents with the resources they need—especially when paired with the full suite of agent tools available through eXp Realty— to attract more clients and close deals with confidence.
  • More Deals, More Earnings: Success Lending’s referral opportunities mean agents can earn additional income through successful mortgage referrals. More deals closed = more commissions in your pocket.

Whether you’re helping a first-time buyer or a seasoned investor, this partnership puts more solutions (and more value) in your hands.

Get More with eXp Realty’s Preferred Partner Program

As part of eXp Realty’s Preferred Partner Program, Success Lending eXp gives agents VIP access to even more tools and training:

  • Exclusive Digital Training & Workshops: Stay up-to-date with Success Lending’s expert-led sessions on mortgages, market trends, and best practices.
  • Marketing Support & Resources: Tap into customizable templates, co-branded materials, and joint marketing strategies—just like in these proven real estate marketing assets tailored for eXp agents—to promote your services and attract more buyers.
  • Streamlined Communication Channels: Enjoy faster, direct access to Success Lending’s loan officers and support staff—helping you get answers (and updates) quickly.

This program is designed to give eXp Realty agents everything they need to deliver a top-notch client experience and focus on what they do best: selling homes and building relationships.

Better Collaboration = Better Results for Clients (And Agents!)

When eXp Realty agents and Success Lending eXp loan officers team up, everyone wins. This partnership isn’t just about smart collaboration—it’s about elevating the entire client experience while opening up new opportunities for agents to grow their business and income.

Faster Closings

When agents and lenders work side-by-side, communication is seamless and proactive. That teamwork shaves days—sometimes even weeks—off the closing timeline. Your clients get the keys to their new homes faster, and you get more time to focus on your next deal.

Tailored Mortgage Solutions for Every Client

Success Lending loan officers collaborate directly with agents to design custom lending solutions that fit each client’s unique financial situation. Whether it’s a first-time buyer, a seasoned investor, or someone with complex financing needs, you can offer mortgage options that close the deal.

New Revenue Opportunities for Agents

Beyond better service for clients, eXp Realty agents can tap into additional income streams through the Success Lending eXp referral program. Agents who refer qualified loan officers may also qualify for bonuses—up to $10,000. It’s a smart way to boost your earnings while expanding your professional network. Success Lending’s referral opportunities mean agents can earn additional income through successful mortgage referrals—another great way to boost your income alongside eXp Realty’s commission split and revenue share model.

More Lending Choices = More Satisfied Clients

Success Lending offers a comprehensive portfolio of mortgage products, from conventional loans to VA loans and first-time buyer programs. More options mean better solutions tailored to each client’s needs, giving you a competitive advantage and building trust that leads to lifelong clients.

Premium Support and Resources to Help Agents Win

With cloud-based tools, ongoing training, and marketing resources, Success Lending eXp equips agents with everything they need to guide clients through the mortgage process confidently. Whether it’s a loan calculator or educational webinars, you’ll have the tools to stay sharp and provide unbeatable service.

Collaboration That Sparks Innovation

Success Lending creates a collaborative culture where agents and mortgage professionals share knowledge, strategies, and best practices. This teamwork leads to innovative solutions, faster problem-solving, and a better experience for both clients and agents.

Happier Clients, Stronger Relationships

A seamless mortgage process builds confidence and turns clients into loyal fans. Happy clients become repeat clients—and they’re more likely to send referrals your way.

Ready to Build Your Future with Success Lending eXp?

eXp Realty agents are turning to Success Lending eXp because it offers something traditional mortgage partnerships don’t—seamless collaboration, better client experiences, and new ways to grow your business. title: Why eXp Commercial Is the Best Brokerage for Commercial Real Estate Agents
excerpt: Key Points Global reach & flexibility: Cloud-based brokerage with no office overhead. 80/20 split ? 100% after $20K cap: Keep all earnings post-cap. Earn extra:…
content:
Key Points

  • Global reach & flexibility: Cloud-based brokerage with no office overhead.
  • 80/20 split ? 100% after $20K cap: Keep all earnings post-cap.
  • Earn extra: Revenue share + stock rewards for production.
  • ICON Program: Top producers get their $20K cap back as stock.
  • CoStar integration: Real-time data & market insights.
  • Advanced tools: Buildout, AIR CRE, Canva Enterprise included.

If you’re a commercial real estate agent who’s over the high splits, outdated tech, and brokerages that treat you like a cog in a dusty filing cabinet—welcome to the upgrade. eXp Commercial was built for agents like you who want more freedom, more upside, and fewer hoops to jump through. Forget the office rent, slow processes, and “we’ve always done it this way” mindset. This isn’t your dad’s real estate brokerage—unless your dad is also killing it from a laptop in Bali.

This modern arm of eXp Realty gives you everything you need to scale your commercial biz without the baggage. From national reach and real-time tools like CoStar to sponsors that help with multiple income streams like revenue share and stock equity, eXp Commercial helps you earn smarter, not harder. And since it’s all cloud-based, you can stop wasting hours commuting to meetings that could’ve been emails. Let’s break down why more top producers are ditching the old-school model and choosing eXp. Here’s your handy dandy index:

What Is eXp Commercial?

More About Stock Awards for eXp Commercial Agents

Achieving ICON Status at eXp Commercial

CoStar Integration Explained: Supercharging eXp Commercial Agents

What Top Producers Are Saying About eXp Commercial
Ready to Build Your Future with eXp Commercial?
Frequently Asked Questions

What Is eXp Commercial?

eXp Commercial is the cutting-edge commercial real estate division of eXp Realty. It is already one of the country’s fastest-growing commercial real estate firms. As a fully virtual commercial real estate brokerage, eXp Commercial empowers agents to run their businesses without the limitations of traditional brick-and-mortar firms. You’ll have access to powerful tech tools, collaborative virtual workspaces, and the ability to earn multiple streams of income—including competitive commissions, revenue share, and stock equity.

Even better? eXp Commercial combines commercial real estate and business brokerage under one innovative platform. Whether you’re brokering investment properties or facilitating business sales, eXp Commercial equips you with everything you need to succeed—wherever you are.

The History of eXp Commercial: A Game-Changer for Commercial Real Estate Agents

After revolutionizing the residential market, eXp Realty set its sights on the commercial sector. In February 2021, eXp World Holdings officially launched eXp Commercial, bringing its cloud-based, tech-forward approach to commercial real estate agents ready for something better.

At the time, traditional commercial brokerages were stuck in outdated models—burdened by expensive office overhead, limited technology, and slow-moving processes. eXp Commercial introduced a virtual brokerage model that removed those barriers, giving commercial real estate agents more flexibility, more earning potential, and access to advanced tools that make doing business faster and smarter.

From Launch to Leadership

Since its debut, eXp Commercial has quickly become one of the most innovative commercial real estate brokerages in the industry. Built for modern commercial real estate agents, it offers a cloud-based platform designed to remove traditional barriers like office overhead and geographical limitations. Instead of being tied to a physical location, eXp Commercial agents have national and global reach—backed by advanced technology and a powerful network of real estate professionals.

What really sets eXp Commercial apart is its relentless focus on providing the tools agents need to succeed in today’s competitive market. From Buildout, which simplifies listing creation and syndication, to CoStar, delivering powerful market data and analytics, eXp Commercial gives agents the tech and flexibility to close deals faster and scale their businesses smarter.

And because it’s all virtual, commercial real estate agents can collaborate in real-time inside eXp World, connect with peers across borders, and access training and mentorship from top industry leaders—all without the costly overhead of traditional commercial real estate brokerages.

eXp Commercial Agent Commission Structure: Built for Growth

At eXp Commercial, the commission structure was designed with the commercial real estate agent in mind. It’s transparent, scalable, and rewards productivity with multiple income streams.

How Agent Splits Work

Agents earn an 80/20 commission split, capped at $20,000 annually. Once you reach the cap, you move to 100% commission, paying only a $250 broker review fee and a $100 E&O fee (capped at $1,000 per year) on each additional transaction.

This simple cap model means agents who produce more keep more. For example, a commercial real estate agent with $300,000 in GCI could save tens of thousands in commission splits compared to traditional commercial real estate brokerages.

Understanding Fees and Caps

Here’s what you can expect:

  • $500 monthly technology fee, covering tools like CoStar, Buildout, AIR CRE, and Canva Enterprise.
  • $250 broker review fee per closed transaction.
  • $100 E&O insurance fee per transaction, capped at $1,000 annually.
  • $20,000 annual commission cap, after which agents keep 100% of their commissions.

Benefits of the Commission Model

This isn’t just about commissions—it’s about building long-term wealth:

  • Revenue Share: Earn up to 4% Tier 1 revenue share when you attract agents to eXp Commercial.
  • Equity Opportunities: Get stock awards for production milestones and sponsorship. Plus, take advantage of the Agent Equity Program, which lets you purchase EXPI stock at a 5% discount.
  • ICON Agent Program: High performers can earn their entire $20,000 cap back in EXPI stock, creating another path to long-term wealth

These programs create multiple income streams for eXp Commercial agents, giving them opportunities to build sustainable, long-term success.

More About Stock Awards for eXp Commercial Agents

At eXp Commercial, building long-term wealth is baked into the model. Agents don’t just earn commissions—they become owners. Through eXp World Holdings’ stock award program, commercial real estate agents have an opportunity to accumulate equity as they build their businesses.

1. How the Stock Awards Program Works

Agents earn EXPI stock awards for hitting key production milestones. Close your first transaction of the year and receive $200 in EXPI stock. Reach your $20,000 cap and unlock even more equity awards. Plus, through the Agent Equity Program, you can choose to divert 5% of your commissions to purchase EXPI stock at a 5% discount—an easy way to create an automatic wealth-building strategy. All stock awards are subject to a three-year vesting period, rewarding agents who are committed to growing their business and the company long-term.

2. The Benefits of Stock Ownership

Owning stock in eXp World Holdings gives commercial real estate agents a direct stake in the company’s success. As the brokerage grows, agents benefit from stock appreciation, creating an additional wealth-building path beyond traditional commission earnings. This alignment between agent and company ensures everyone works toward mutual success.

And for agents who hit production benchmarks like $100K in GCI, the benefits multiply—providing both immediate income and long-term equity.

Achieving ICON Status at eXp Commercial

For commercial real estate agents who want to take their success to the next level, ICON Status at eXp Commercial is the ultimate recognition. Reserved for top producers, this prestigious designation rewards high achievers with major perks—plus a hefty stock award.

What Is ICON Status?

ICON Status honors commercial real estate agents who demonstrate outstanding production and leadership. It’s not just a badge of honor—it comes with serious financial benefits, including the opportunity to earn back your entire $20,000 cap in EXPI stock.

ICON Agents are also recognized company-wide and invited to exclusive networking events and leadership programs, elevating their brand and opening doors to even more high-level opportunities.

How to Qualify for ICON Status

To qualify, agents must meet a production threshold by contributing $20,000 in cap commissions within 12 months. After capping, they must close additional deals that contribute to their total production and engage in eXp’s cultural activities, like mentoring or participating in company events.

For commercial real estate agents dealing with higher-priced assets or longer sales cycles, there are flexible pathways that take into account deal size and volume to ensure ICON is within reach.

CoStar Integration Explained: Supercharging eXp Commercial Agents

In today’s fast-paced commercial real estate market, top-tier data and analytics aren’t a luxury—they’re a necessity. That’s why eXp Commercial partnered with CoStar Group, the industry leader in commercial real estate data. This powerful integration gives eXp Commercial agents a competitive advantage with instant access to the most accurate property information and deep market insights—all in one place.

Combining CoStar’s data powerhouse with eXp Commercial’s cloud-based model allows agents to make smarter decisions, close deals faster, and deliver an exceptional client experience. The best part? Other agents pay over $500/month for just this one tool! eXp agents get CoStar and more value for their $500/month fee.

1. What Is CoStar Integration?

CoStar is the leading platform for commercial real estate data, covering every property sector—office, retail, industrial, multifamily, land, and more. It offers the most comprehensive and up-to-date database in the industry.

With CoStar integrated directly into the eXp Commercial platform, agents gain:

  • Real-time access to property listings and market trends.
  • Advanced analytics for evaluating investments and opportunities.
  • Streamlined tools for researching comps, demographics, and competitive landscapes.

This integration simplifies research, shortens the decision-making process, and equips agents with actionable insights right when you need them.

2. Key Benefits for eXp Commercial Agents

The CoStar integration does more than provide data—it transforms how eXp Commercial agents work. Here’s how it makes a difference:

Data You Can Trust – Agents get access to CoStar’s industry-leading database, featuring verified, real-time property and market information. No guesswork—just reliable insights you can act on.

Stronger Client Relationships – Backed by CoStar’s analytics, agents deliver well-informed, data-driven recommendations on site selection, leasing strategies, and investment opportunities. This builds trust and credibility with clients.

Faster, Smarter Decisions – CoStar’s tools consolidate everything in one place, from market analysis to property comparisons. This reduces research time, allowing agents to move quickly and capitalize on opportunities.

A Competitive Advantage – Access to comprehensive data, demographic reports, and traffic analysis helps agents offer customized solutions that stand out—giving them an edge over competitors still using outdated methods

3. How to Access CoStar Tools at eXp Commercial

Getting started with CoStar as an eXp Commercial agent is simple:

  1. Log in to your eXp Commercial account.
  2. Head to the CoStar portal within your dashboard.
  3. Use CoStar’s advanced search and analysis tools to explore properties, run reports, and gather market intelligence.

With intuitive navigation and seamless integration into the eXp Commercial virtual platform, agents can maximize CoStar’s features without missing a beat.

What Top Producers Are Saying About eXp Commercial

Karl Markarian, a Los Angeles-based commercial real estate advisor with over 30 years of experience and $200 million in sales volume over the past five years, made the switch to eXp Commercial. After holding leadership roles at top brokerages like John Hart Real Estate, The Agency, and Douglas Elliman, Karl saw eXp Commercial as the clear choice for his future growth.

“I joined eXp Commercial to scale my business and to benefit from revenue share and stock opportunities,” Karl shared.

Since joining, Karl has been impressed by the support from eXp’s staff and leadership, and he’s already setting ambitious goals. “Together, we’re building something monumental. Our team is aiming for $1 billion in sales volume, and with eXp’s model, I’m confident we’ll get there.”

Ready to Build Your Future with eXp Commercial?

Top producers like Karl Markarian are making the move to eXp Commercial for a reason. With industry-leading tools, multiple income streams, and a collaborative culture designed to help you scale, there’s never been a better time to be a commercial real estate agent with eXp.

And when you partner with Smart Agent Alliance as your sponsor, you’ll get even more. Our team offers the most valuable support package in the industry—free. That includes:

  • A done-for-you and web-hosted agent attraction webpage
  • Agent attraction calls are hosted for you, so you earn passive income without doing the pitch
  • A $10,500 social media training course with weekly meetings (yep, included)
  • Weekly mastermind coaching with top producers
  • Lead gen funnel, automated emails, customizable marketing tools and more

All at zero extra cost when you join our agent-obsessed team. Ready to learn more? Visit SmartAgentAlliance.com and discover why eXp Realty—in combo with Smart Agent Alliance—is the best real estate brokerage for agents who want the support, tools, and freedom to succeed.

Not sure if eXp is the right fit for you? Take this quick quiz to find out if eXp is a good match, especially if support and systems matter to you.

Curious if revenue share passive income is a big deal? Spoiler – it is.  You can play with the numbers using our exp realty revenue share calculator to see how much you could earn.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is eXp Commercial?

eXp Commercial is a cloud-based division of eXp Realty, designed for commercial real estate agents. It offers advanced technology, virtual collaboration, and multiple income streams, including revenue share and stock equity.

When did eXp Commercial launch?

eXp Commercial was officially launched in February 2021 by eXp World Holdings to bring its successful virtual brokerage model to the commercial real estate industry.

How does the eXp Commercial commission structure work?

eXp Commercial agents earn an 80/20 commission split, capped at $20,000 per year. After reaching the cap, agents keep 100% of their commissions, paying only minimal transaction fees. Top agents can earn their $20,000 paid to eXp back in company stock.

Does eXp Commercial offer revenue share?

Yes! eXp Commercial agents can earn up to 4% Tier 1 revenue share by attracting other agents to the brokerage, creating an additional passive income stream.

What tools do eXp Commercial agents get?

Agents get access to top-tier platforms like CoStar, Buildout, AIR CRE, and Canva Enterprise, plus virtual workspaces in eXp World and Skyslope transaction management.

What is CoStar, and how does it benefit eXp Commercial agents?

CoStar is the leading commercial real estate data platform. eXp Commercial agents get integrated access to CoStar’s real-time property listings, market analytics, and demographic data—enhancing their decision-making and giving them a competitive edge.

How do stock awards work at eXp Commercial?

Agents earn EXPI stock for hitting key production milestones. They can also participate in the Agent Equity Program to purchase stock at a discount. ICON agents can earn their full cap back in EXPI stock.

What is the ICON Agent Program at eXp Commercial?

The ICON Program rewards top producers by returning their $20,000 commission cap in EXPI stock. It also includes recognition, exclusive networking opportunities, and leadership roles within the company.

Is eXp Commercial a global brokerage?

Yes! eXp Commercial gives agents national and global reach through its virtual platform, allowing them to expand beyond local markets.

Why join eXp Commercial instead of a traditional commercial real estate brokerage?

eXp Commercial eliminates costly office overhead and outdated systems. Agents benefit from higher commission splits, stock equity, revenue share, and advanced tech tools—making it one of the best real estate brokerages for modern commercial real estate agents.

How do I join eXp Commercial with Smart Agent Alliance?

Key Points

  • Errors and Omissions Insurance (E&O insurance) protects real estate agents from lawsuits.
  • eXp Realty charges only $60 per transaction for E&O insurance and caps this fee at $750 annually.

  • eXp Realty agents benefit from per-transaction E&O fees, not hefty upfront annual costs or monthly payments.
  • eXp leveraged its size and profitability to negotiate lower insurance premiums and deductibles for its agents.

Real estate deals are exciting—but they’re also loaded with details, deadlines, and legal documents that can keep even the most seasoned real estate agents on their toes. One missed disclosure, a misunderstood contract, or an unhappy client can quickly turn into a costly legal headache. That’s where errors and omissions insurance steps in. Whether you call it E&O insurance, E & O insurance, or professional liability coverage, it’s a must-have for every real estate professional.

At its core, errors and omissions insurance protects you if a client claims you made a mistake, overlooked something important, or didn’t deliver the service they expected. It covers your legal defense costs—and potential settlements—so you’re not digging into your commissions to handle lawsuits. Whether you’re an agent at a traditional brokerage or part of a modern virtual real estate brokerage like eXp Realty, this coverage isn’t optional—it’s essential.

And speaking of eXp Realty, here’s where they make things easy. At eXp Realty, E&O insurance for real estate agents is seamlessly built into their transaction system. You’ll pay a low per-transaction fee until you hit your cap (more on that later), giving you peace of mind without hefty upfront costs. No need to search endlessly for cheap E&O insurance for real estate agents—at eXp, it’s handled for you.

If you’re wondering how errors and omissions insurance works, how much errors and omissions insurance costs, and why eXp Realty is the best real estate brokerage for new agents looking for simplicity and protection, you’re in the right place. Let’s break it down—without the legal jargon. Here’s your handy dandy index:

Why Real Estate Agents Need Errors and Omissions Insurance

When you’re working in real estate—whether you’re with a traditional brokerage or a cutting-edge virtual real estate brokerage like eXp Realty—there’s one universal truth: mistakes (or even the perception of mistakes) can be expensive. Real estate transactions often involve hundreds of thousands, if not millions of dollars. And when that kind of money is on the line, even the most honest real estate agents can find themselves facing legal claims.

That’s why errors and omissions insurance is non-negotiable. Whether it’s an unintentional oversight, a miscommunication, or a misunderstanding about a property, clients can and do file lawsuits. Sometimes it’s justified, and sometimes it’s not. Either way, E&O insurance for real estate agents is there to cover your legal defense costs, settlements, and other related expenses—so you’re not risking your business or your bank account.  According to the National Association of Realtors, E&O insurance is essential for protecting agents against claims of inadequate work or negligent actions.

But it’s not just about protecting yourself. Errors and omissions insurance also shield your brokerage from the financial fallout of potential lawsuits. Brokerages and their agents are often jointly liable in claims, which is why most brokerages—including top real estate brokerages in the USA like eXp Realty—require this kind of coverage.

How Brokerages Charge for Errors and Omissions Insurance

When it comes to errors and omissions insurance, how a real estate brokerage charges you can make a huge difference in your bottom line. Some brokerages offer flexibility, while others demand hefty upfront payments—whether you’re closing deals or not. Understanding these different fee structures is key to finding the right fit for your business and protecting your cash flow.

Upfront Annual Fees (Before You Even Close a Deal)

Some real estate brokerages, including big names like Sotheby’s and Compass, charge agents an upfront annual fee for E&O insurance. And we’re not talking pocket change. In places like Marin County, CA, agents can expect to pay $2,200—or more—just to get started. That’s due the day you sign up to work there before you even close your first deal. For many agents, that’s a big financial hurdle. So while these firms might have name recognition, the errors and omissions insurance cost can be steep from day one.

Monthly E&O Fees (Whether You’re Selling or Not)

Other brokerages spread out the cost with monthly E&O insurance fees. That can feel easier to manage—until you realize you’re on the hook for payments whether you’re closing deals or not. Some real estate brokerages, including certain Keller Williams and Coldwell Banker offices, charge anywhere from $300 to $350 per month. That’s $3,600 or more per year—just to have errors and omissions insurance in place, even if you’re not making sales.

Per-Transaction E&O Charges (What eXp Realty Offers)

Then there’s the per-transaction model, which is where eXp Realty really stands out. Instead of charging you upfront or every month, eXp agents only pay $60 per transaction for their errors and omissions insurance—and only when they close a deal. Even better? eXp Realty caps that fee at $750 per year —use our commission calculator to see what that could mean for your bottom line.. So, if you’re a high-producing agent, you’ll never pay more, even if you’re closing deal after deal—just one of the perks eXp agents share often. It’s part of why many consider eXp Realty the best real estate brokerage for new agents and seasoned pros alike—especially those who want to keep their overhead low while benefiting from top-tier real estate agent tools and virtual real estate brokerage support.

Don’t Forget About Deductibles—They Matter More Than You Think

Here’s something many agents overlook when they’re comparing errors and omissions insurance: the deductible. And trust us, it matters. If a client files a claim and your E&O insurance has to step in, you’re responsible for paying that deductible before your coverage kicks in.

At many traditional real estate brokerages—and especially at some 100% commission real estate brokerages—deductibles can be sky-high. We’re talking $10,000 or more! That’s a huge financial hit, and one that can catch agents completely off guard. You might save a little on monthly or transaction fees, but if something goes wrong, you’re suddenly on the hook for five figures. Ouch.

But here’s where eXp Realty shines again. Thanks to its massive size and negotiating power as one of the top real estate brokerages in the USA, eXp has secured much lower deductibles for its agents. At eXp, your deductible is capped at just $2,500. That’s significantly less than what you’ll find at other real estate brokerages, and it means more peace of mind for you—and your bank account.

So when you’re comparing E&O insurance for real estate agents, don’t just look at the upfront fees. Take a hard look at the deductible, too. If you ever need to use your errors and omissions insurance, you’ll be glad you’re with eXp Realty, where they’ve leveraged their size to give agents better protection at a fraction of the cost.

Factors That Affect Errors and Omissions Insurance Costs for Real Estate Agents

Whether you’re at a traditional brokerage or a virtual real estate brokerage like eXp Realty, it’s important to understand what drives the cost of errors and omissions insurance. If you’re shopping for coverage or comparing brokerages, knowing what impacts your E&O insurance costs can help you make a smarter choice—and keep more money in your pocket.

Here’s what every agent should know about the factors that influence E&O insurance for real estate agents:

Industry and Professional Role

Not all real estate niches carry the same level of risk—and that plays a big role in how much you’ll pay for errors and omissions insurance. For example, commercial real estate brokers tend to pay more because those transactions come with higher dollar amounts and more complex contracts, which increase the risk of legal claims. Dual agency situations also carry more exposure since you’re representing both the buyer and the seller in the same transaction. More complexity means more opportunities for misunderstandings (and lawsuits).

Good news for eXp Realty agents: unlike some real estate brokerages, eXp doesn’t charge more for E&O insurance when you act as a dual agent. That’s another way eXp Realty puts agents first, offering fair, consistent pricing no matter how you choose to structure your deals.

Business Size

The bigger the brokerage or team, the higher the potential risk—and that usually means higher errors and omissions insurance costs. More agents mean more transactions, which means more chances for things to go wrong. But here’s where eXp Realty turns the tables. As one of the largest and most successful online real estate brokerages in the world, eXp uses its size to negotiate better E&O insurance rates for every agent. So instead of higher premiums, you benefit from eXp’s bulk buying power.

Deductibles

Just like with any insurance, your E&O deductible plays a major role in the cost of your policy. A higher deductible usually means lower premiums, but it’s a tradeoff—you’ll need to have that cash ready if a legal claim is made. At many real estate brokerages, deductibles can climb as high as $10,000 (or more). At eXp Realty, the deductible is capped at $2,500, thanks to eXp’s ability to leverage its agent network for better deals. Lower deductibles mean less risk for you and more peace of mind.

Errors and Omissions (E&O) insurance protects real estate agents from legal claims alleging mistakes, negligence, or failure to deliver professional services. It covers legal defense costs, settlements, and related expenses.

content:
Key Points

  • Commission: 80/20 split, $16k annual cap ? 100% post-cap.
  • ICON Program: Top agents reclaim $16k cap as company stock.
  • Stock Earnings: ICON agents earn 100%+ via stock awards.
  • Passive Income: Revshare (willable, retirement-ready) vs. standard 100% brokerages.

If you’re on the hunt for a 100% commission real estate brokerage, you’re probably thinking one thing: “How do I keep more of my hard-earned commission and build real wealth in real estate?” We get it. You want freedom. Flexibility. More control over your business—and your life. But here’s the thing: Not all 100% commission brokerages are created equal. In fact, most leave you doing all the heavy lifting on your own.

Enter eXp Realty. While we’re not technically a 100% commission brokerage, for top producers, it can be just that—and more. Here’s how: every agent at eXp starts with an 80/20 commission split, but once you hit your $16,000 cap, you earn 100% commission for the rest of your year. And if you’re a high-producing agent, you can qualify for eXp’s ICON Agent Program, where you earn that entire $16,000 cap back in company stock. Plus you earn eXp stock too. That’s right. Hit your numbers and you’re not just at 100% commission—you’re earning more than 100%.

For just $85 a month, you’ll gain access to a tech-forward, agent-centric platform that goes far beyond what traditional real estate brokerages offer.

So, what exactly do you get for your real estate brokerage fee at eXp Realty? Here’s a cursory breakdown of the powerful resources and support that come with it.  For greater details on these, click on other tiles on our About eXp page.

1. Comprehensive Technology Tools (A $1,100+ Value Alone!)

eXp Realty invests heavily in real estate technology to keep you ahead of the competition. As part of your real estate brokerage fee, you’ll receive some of the most advanced tools in the industry—at no extra cost. The best part?  eXp tech is always state-of-the-art; you won’t be stuck like many non-exp agents are, with old tech in a constantly changing tech world. Here are some of those tools:

  • eXp World – Our exclusive metaverse office space where you can meet with brokers, access live support, collaborate with teammates, and even host your own virtual meetings.
  • eXp Workplace – Think of it as a private Facebook (without distractions!) for eXp Realty agents—connect, share strategies, and stay informed.
  • BoldTrail CRM (formerly kvCORE) – This predictive CRM helps you manage and convert leads more efficiently with automation, AI-powered analytics, and customizable campaigns.
  • SkySlope Transaction Management – Streamline your transaction process, keep documents organized, and stay compliant with ease.
  • SISU Analytics – Track your sales activities, set team goals, and align your business with performance-driven data.
  • Canva Pro – Create stunning marketing materials, real estate agent business card templates, real estate flyer templates, and more—no graphic designer required!
  • My eXp – Your personalized agent dashboard to manage transactions and commissions and access everything you need in one place.

Fun Fact: Agents at other real estate brokerages pay upwards of $1,100 a month for these tools alone. At eXp, it’s all covered under your $85 real estate brokerage fee.

2. Extensive Training & Free Real Estate Coaching

Training isn’t an afterthought at eXp—it’s the heart of our culture. As part of your real estate brokerage fee, you’ll get access to:

  • 50+ hours of live training every single week, taught by top real estate brokers in the USA.
  • You can take on-demand courses anytime through our GO curriculum, perfect for new real estate agents.
  • Two 6-week action-driven programs designed to take your business from “stuck” to scaling.
  • A complete library of courses covering real estate strategies for agents, social media, lead generation, and more.

Whether you’re looking for real estate coaching for new agents or strategies to take your seasoned business to the next level, eXp has you covered.

3. Exclusive Lead Opportunities (Revenos Leads!)

Unlike other real estate brokerages, eXp Realty has an in-house team dedicated to lead generation—Revenos. This isn’t just a lead drip. It’s a full-fledged system:

  • In 2024, eXp Realty agents closed over $2 billion in sales from these leads!
  • Revenos Staff is the only real estate brokerage team solely focused on generating leads for agents.
  • Leads are free upfront.  You pay a fee only when you close a deal.  Get started by completing the simple, division-specific training.

4. A Supportive Agent Community Like No Other

eXp Realty isn’t just a virtual real estate brokerage; it’s a true real estate agent community. You’ll collaborate with other eXp agents across the globe, share strategies, and build lasting relationships.

  • Tap into Smart Agent Alliance and all their weekly team calls.
  • Attend mastermind calls, regional meetups, and live events like eXpCON.
  • Use eXp World and Workplace to reach everyone at eXp.

This sense of connection and community is a major reason why so many agents rave about their eXp Realty reviews.

5. Revenue Share—Passive Income for the Future

eXp Realty’s revenue share model is hands down one of the best in the industry. As part of your real estate brokerage fee, you’ll have access to:

  • A 7-tier revenue share plan that rewards you for bringing other talented agents into eXp.
  • Wealth-building potential that continues even after retirement—and it’s willable, so your family benefits too.
  • Sponsors and teams like Smart Agent Alliance help you attract, onboard, and support agents without doing all the heavy lifting yourself.
  • See the income possibilities for yourself with our eXp Revenue Share Calculator.

6. Sponsor Team Benefits (Like Smart Agent Alliance!)

Unlike traditional real estate brokerages, eXp Realty lets sponsors offer extra value to their teams. That’s different than any other brokerage!  And the value can be off the charts.  For example, when you join eXp Realty and name Smart Agent Alliance as your sponsor, Smart Agent Alliance runs meetings so you gain passive income. Smart Agent Alliance also gives agents access to:

  • A branded and hosted real estate agent attraction website
  • Social Agent Academy Pro ($10,500 value) for social media marketing
  • Weekly coaching sessions with top producers
  • Customizable lead funnels, email campaigns, and marketing templates
  • And more…

If you don’t know all about Smart Agent Alliance’s extraordinary free value, check out our team value webpage.

How the $85 Real Estate Brokerage Fee Compares to Traditional Brokerages

When you compare eXp Realty’s $85 monthly real estate brokerage fee to the fees charged by traditional real estate brokerages, the difference is night and day. Most agents at brick-and-mortar brokerages end up paying a variety of extra costs that chip away at their commissions, often without realizing how much they’re spending.

Here’s a quick breakdown of common fees at traditional brokerages:

  • Franchise Fees – Typically 6-8% of every transaction, these go straight to the corporate franchisor (and they never stop).
  • Desk Fees – Agents often pay $200 to $1,000+ per month just to have a physical office space—even if they don’t use it.
  • Royalties & Transaction Fees – Some brokerages charge additional royalties on top of splits, plus admin or processing fees per transaction.
  • Office Overhead – At many traditional brokerages, agents cover shared office expenses, marketing collateral, and even office supplies.
  • Tech Subscriptions – CRM, transaction management software, and marketing tools usually aren’t included. Agents end up subscribing to third-party services (often at premium prices) to fill in the gaps.

Now, compare that to eXp Realty:
For a flat $85 per month, you get everything included—no franchise fees, no desk fees, and no royalties.

And the best part? eXp Realty’s brokerage fee doesn’t increase as you grow. Whether you’re closing a handful of deals a year or you’re a top producer hitting icon status, your monthly real estate brokerage fee stays the same. It’s predictable, affordable, and scalable—especially for high-performing agents who want to maximize their income and minimize their expenses.

At eXp Realty, your business is designed to scale without scaling up your costs. It’s one of the many reasons why eXp continues to be one of the best real estate brokerages for new agents and seasoned pros alike.

How the eXp Realty Brokerage Fee Supports Work-Life Freedom

At most traditional real estate brokerages, agents are tied to a physical office. Desk time, mandatory meetings, and commuting often eat into valuable hours you could be using to grow your business—or enjoy your life. With eXp Realty, your $85 monthly real estate brokerage fee covers a full tech stack designed to break those old rules and give you total freedom.

Why Pay More to Get Less?

When you really stack it up, most real estate brokerage fees feel like paying for a fancy gym membership where half the machines are broken and no one shows you how to use them. Meanwhile, eXp Realty hands you the keys to an all-inclusive business suite for a flat $85 a month. No royalty fees. No bloated overhead. No mystery charges that show up like an uninvited guest at your closing table.

Instead, you get high-powered tools, actual training, free leads, and a global community that doesn’t just wave from afar—they help you win.

And if you’re looking to really take this $85 fee to the next level? That’s where Smart Agent Alliance steps in. With our done-for-you marketing systems, team-led agent attraction, weekly coaching, and plug-and-play templates – all free for agents who join us.

Not sure if eXp is the right fit for you? Take this quick quiz to find out if eXp is a good match—especially if support and systems matter to you. Not sure how passive income grows?  You can play with the numbers using our exp realty revenue share calculator to see how much you could earn. Not sure how to become a real estate agent? We’ve got loads of helpful info on that too.

Frequently Asked Questions

What does the eXp Realty $85 real estate brokerage fee cover?

The $85 real estate brokerage fee at eXp Realty includes cutting-edge real estate technology like BoldTrail CRM, eXp World, SkySlope, Canva Pro, and more. It also covers unlimited access to live training, coaching, support, and more!

How does eXp Realty’s brokerage fee compare to traditional real estate brokerages?

Traditional real estate brokerages often charge multiple fees—franchise fees, desk fees, royalty fees, and tech subscriptions—while eXp Realty offers a flat, affordable $85 monthly fee, making it a more predictable and scalable option.

Is eXp Realty considered a virtual real estate brokerage?

Yes! eXp Realty is a fully virtual real estate brokerage that offers agents freedom and flexibility through its virtual platform. You can run your entire business from anywhere—no brick-and-mortar office required.

What technology is included in eXp Realty’s brokerage fee?

Your real estate brokerage fee covers access to eXp World, BoldTrail CRM, SkySlope, SISU Analytics, Canva Pro, My eXp, and eXp Enterprise—top-rated real estate agent resources designed to streamline your business.

Does eXp Realty offer leads as part of the brokerage fee?

Yes! Through Revenos, eXp Realty agents have access to exclusive lead opportunities. Agents closed over $2 billion in sales in 2024 through this system, with training provided to help you get started.

Why is eXp Realty one of the best real estate brokerages for new agents?

eXp Realty combines affordable fees, a strong support system, cutting-edge real estate technology, and world-class training, making it one of the best real estate brokerages for new agents.

Can I build a passive income stream at eXp Realty?

Absolutely! eXp Realty offers the industry’s best revenue share program, allowing agents to earn passive income by attracting and supporting new agents.

title: What Is the eXp Mentor Program? Real Estate Mentoring on Steroids!

content:
Key Points

  • Program Eligibility: For new agents or those with fewer than three transactions in the past year.
  • Mentor Pairing: You are matched with a certified local mentor for hands-on guidance through your first three deals.
  • Coaching Focus: Step-by-step support on contracts, negotiations, client communication, and managing transactions.
  • Commission Split: 60% to the agent, 10% to the mentor, 10% to the program, and 20% to eXp Realty (applies to the cap).
  • Program Completion: Graduates work independently with continued access to eXp’s agent community and resources.
  • Sponsorship Bonus: Joining via Smart Agent Alliance adds free training, marketing templates, lead generation tools, and premium support.
  • Outcome: Combines mentorship and sponsorship for faster growth and long-term success at a top brokerage for new agents.

Let’s be real—starting out in real estate without a mentor is like skydiving with YouTube as your instructor. You might land safely… or you might just end up crying into your stack of untouched business cards.

That’s exactly why the eXp Mentor Program exists. It’s not some fluffy “check-in once and disappear” kind of thing. It’s a real, structured, boots-on-the-ground mentorship that gives new and returning agents the guidance they actually need.

Whether you’re fresh out of real estate school or dusting off your license after a year of ghost town-level production, this program pairs you with a certified, local mentor who’s been in your shoes—and didn’t trip. You’ll get step-by-step coaching through your first deals, personalized feedback, and the kind of insight that Google just can’t give you. Here’s your handy-dandy index:

What’s the Purpose of the eXp Mentor Program?
Who Qualifies for the eXp Mentor Program?
Key Features of the eXp Mentor Program
How the eXp Mentor Program Works

Why eXp Realty’s Mentorship Program Stands Out
How Is the Curriculum Structured?
What Will You Learn in the eXp Mentor Program?
What Are the Requirements to Complete the eXp Mentor Program?

Mentorship vs. Sponsorship at eXp Realty: What’s the Difference and Why You Need Both

Why the eXp Mentor Program Is a No-Brainer for New Agents
Frequently Asked Questions

What’s the Purpose of the eXp Mentor Program?

The purpose of the eXp Mentor Program is simple: to help you become an independent, capable, and confident agent as quickly as possible. Whether you’re learning how to navigate contracts or figuring out how to manage your first open house, your real estate mentor will be there to provide step-by-step guidance.

But it goes beyond the basics. Your eXp-certified mentor helps you develop the skills that make you a true professional—whether that’s negotiating offers, providing exceptional client service, or handling the inevitable curveballs that come with any real estate transaction. This is why many agents view the eXp mentorship program as one of the most comprehensive real estate mentoring programs available today.

By the time you complete the program, you’ll be ready to manage transactions confidently and independently.

Who Qualifies for the eXp Mentor Program?

If you’re a newly licensed agent—or you’ve had fewer than three closed transactions in the past year—you’ll be automatically enrolled in the eXp mentor program when you join eXp Realty. The idea is to make sure every new eXp agent gets the hands-on training and real-world experience they need to succeed.

For more experienced agents, there’s flexibility. If you’ve been in the business before but took some time off, eXp’s team will review your history to determine whether mentorship is necessary. It’s not a one-size-fits-all approach—it’s about making sure you get the right level of support for where you are in your career.

This thoughtful structure is another reason eXp is the most profitable real estate brokerage and a great fit for agents who want the balance of independence and mentorship.

Key Features of the eXp Mentor Program

What makes the eXp mentorship program stand out from other real estate mentoring programs? It’s the personalized approach and comprehensive support. Here’s what you can expect:

  • Local Mentorship: You’ll be paired with an eXp-certified mentor who understands your local market—someone who can give you insights on neighborhood trends, pricing strategies, and regional contract requirements.
  • Step-by-Step Guidance: From your first client consult to closing day, you’ll have a clear, structured path to follow.
  • On-Demand Resources: You’ll get access to eXp’s library of training materials and live support to reinforce what you’re learning in the field.
  • Supportive Community: No question is too small. You’ll be part of a collaborative, encouraging real estate agent community where learning and growth are always prioritized.

By the time you complete the program, you’ll not only have valuable experience under your belt—you’ll also be plugged into one of the strongest real estate mentoring networks in the industry.

How the eXp Mentor Program Works

Starting your real estate career—or restarting it after a slow year—can be overwhelming. That’s exactly why the eXp Mentor Program exists. This is one of the most structured, supportive real estate mentorship programs offered by any brokerage today, and it’s a huge reason many new agent reviews say eXp is the best real estate brokerage for new agents.

The eXp Mentor Program isn’t just about learning how to close deals. It’s about having an experienced real estate mentor in your corner, walking you through those critical first few transactions, and helping you build real confidence as you launch your career at one of the top real estate brokerages in the USA.

Here’s a breakdown of how the eXp mentorship program works and why it’s considered one of the best real estate mentoring programs out there.

1. Mentor Assignments: Who You’ll Be Paired With

Once you join eXp Realty as a new or returning agent with fewer than three completed transactions in the past year, you’re automatically placed into the eXp mentor program. You won’t need to search online to find a real estate mentor—the program matches you with a certified eXp mentor who’s already been vetted and trained by the company.

These mentors are more than just experienced eXp Realty agents. They’re local experts who know your specific market inside and out. Whether you’re selling homes in San Diego, Dallas, or Atlanta, you’ll have a real estate mentor who understands the local requirements and customs, pricing trends, buyer expectations, and negotiation tactics unique to your region.

This local expertise makes eXp’s real estate mentorship program one of the most practical and hands-on in the industry.

2. What Does an eXp Mentor Do?

An eXp mentor acts as your personal guide and coach during your early days at the brokerage. Their role is to provide real estate mentoring through:

  • Transaction support
  • Guidance on contracts and offers
  • Coaching on client communication
  • Showing you how to run a successful open house or buyer consultation

Your mentor makes sure you’re learning practical, real-world skills you’ll use every day. If you’re wondering what does a real estate mentor do at eXp Realty, think of them as a bridge between classroom learning and hands-on experience..

3. Transaction Support: Step-by-Step Guidance on Your First Deals

As part of the eXp mentorship program, you’ll receive hands-on help through your first three transactions. This isn’t theory—it’s real-time coaching as you:

  • List properties
  • Write offers and purchase agreements with Skyslope
  • Navigate contracts and disclosures
  • Negotiate deals and close escrows

For many new eXp Realty agents, this support is what makes eXp one of the best virtual real estate brokerages for launching a career. You’ll gain confidence because you’ll be learning by doing, with a professional watching your back and helping you avoid common mistakes.

4. The eXp Mentor Program Split: How Commissions Are Divided

While you’re part of the eXp mentor program, your first three transactions will follow a 60/40 commission split. Here’s how it breaks down:

  • 60% of your commission goes to you
  • 10% of your commission goes directly to your eXp mentor as compensation for their time and guidance.
  • 10% is allocated to the eXp mentorship program itself, covering administrative costs and additional resources.
  • The remaining 20% of your commission goes to eXp Realty, counting toward your annual $16,000 cap.

For example, if you earn a $10,000 commission on a deal:

  • $6,000 goes to you
  • $1,000 goes to your mentor
  • $1,000 goes to the program
  • $2,000 goes to eXp Realty and counts toward your cap

This eXp mentor program split ensures you’re getting high-level support when you need it most—without hidden costs or surprises.

5. Flexibility to Switch Mentors If Needed

Not every mentorship match is perfect, and eXp Realty gets that. If you feel like your mentor isn’t the best fit, you can request a change through the eXp mentor program support team.

Maybe you want to focus on a specialty niche, like luxury real estate or investment properties. Maybe you’re looking for a different coaching style. Whatever the reason, the ability to switch mentors makes this one of the most flexible and agent-centric real estate mentoring programs available.

Why eXp Realty’s Mentorship Program Stands Out

The eXp mentorship program is a key reason why so many agents say eXp is the best real estate brokerage for new agents. It combines the flexibility of an online real estate brokerage with the personal support of an in-person office—without any of the competition or politics you find in traditional real estate brokerages.

You get access to one of the top real estate brokerages’ national and global networks, cutting-edge tools, and, most importantly, a dedicated mentor who’s committed to your success.

How Is the Curriculum Structured?

The eXp mentorship program is organized into easy-to-follow, on-demand modules that help you build your skills one step at a time. No overwhelm, no confusion, and completely flexible to access when it’s best for you.

You’ll start with the basics of real estate fundamentals and then dive deeper into the strategies top agents use to close deals and grow their businesses.

Each module covers a specific topic, and they’re broken down in a way that’s manageable—perfect for fitting around your schedule. One day, you’re learning how to conduct a killer buyer consultation, and the next, you’re mastering negotiation tactics that win offers in competitive markets.

What makes this one of the best real estate mentorship programs out there? It’s a powerful blend of learning formats:

  • Pre-recorded video lessons you can watch anytime
  • Live mentoring sessions with your local eXp mentor
  • Interactive activities to reinforce what you’ve learned

It’s fun, flexible, and focused on helping you build real skills you’ll use every day.

What Will You Learn in the eXp Mentor Program?

This real estate agent coaching isn’t just about theory—it’s about giving you a toolbox full of strategies and practical knowledge. Here’s a quick overview of what’s covered in the eXp mentorship program:

  • Real Estate Fundamentals: Learn the basics of contracts, disclosures, and fair housing regulations
  • Marketing Strategies: Discover how to market yourself and your listings to attract buyers and sellers
  • Client Relationship Management: Build skills for working with buyers and sellers, handling objections, and creating referral-worthy experiences
  • Transaction Processes: Understand each step of a transaction, from listing to closing

No matter what you’re looking for, this program has you covered.

What Are the Requirements to Complete the eXp Mentor Program?

Success isn’t handed to you—it’s earned! The eXp mentor program sets clear benchmarks so you can track your progress and know when you’ve mastered each area of the business.

Transaction Completion Criteria

Mentees need to complete at least three transactions under the supervision of their eXp mentor. These transactions are your chance to put everything you’ve learned into action, with your mentor by your side to make sure you’re doing it right.

Your mentor reviews each transaction, giving you feedback and ensuring you’re following best practices. This hands-on experience is what makes eXp Realty one of the best real estate brokerages for new agents—you get real-world practice without being thrown to the wolves.

Graduation Process for Mentees

Once you’ve completed your required transactions and actively participated in the training, your mentor will give you the green light to graduate. Typically, mentees complete the program within six months, but the timeline can vary based on how quickly you close deals.

Graduating from the eXp mentor program means you’ve built a solid foundation for your business—and you’re ready to fly solo (with ongoing support from your eXp agent community, of course!).

Mentorship vs. Sponsorship at eXp Realty: What’s the Difference and Why You Need Both

By now, you understand how valuable the eXp Mentor Program is for building your real estate career on a solid foundation. But there’s another powerful support system you should be tapping into at eXp Realty—your sponsorship line. Understanding the difference between mentorship vs. sponsorship at eXp is key to unlocking the full potential of this brokerage and setting yourself up for long-term success.

At eXp Realty, you’re not going it alone. The real estate mentorship program helps you master the basics, while your sponsor helps you scale and expand your business. These are two different roles, but together, they form a dynamic support system that makes eXp Realty an unbeatable choice!

The Role of an eXp Mentor

Your real estate mentor focuses on your early-stage development. As part of the eXp mentorship program, their role is to:

  • Teach you the transaction process from start to finish
  • Show you how to work with buyers and sellers confidently
  • Provide one-on-one support as you learn the ropes
  • Build your knowledge base through personalized coaching and real-world experience

Mentors are the backbone of your real estate mentoring, ensuring you gain the skills and confidence to navigate contracts, negotiations, and client relationships. This is especially important if you’re new or just getting back into the business after time away.

The Role of an eXp Sponsor

An eXp mentor and an eXp sponsor are not the same thing and they have two different, distinctive roles. While your mentor helps you master the fundamentals, if you have an active sponsor line, you may find an eXp sponsor that can be your business partner in growth. However, great sponsors are not usually local and they don’t help with your day-to-day business needs. And, remember, eXp sponsors are not required to provide any value, but a good one, like Smart Agent Alliance, goes over the top in providing value.

Why the eXp Mentor Program Is a No-Brainer for New Agents

There’s no sugarcoating it—real estate is tough when you’re flying solo. But with the eXp Mentor Program, you’re not just guessing your way through contracts, hoping your first open house doesn’t implode, or learning the hard way what not to say to a buyer. You’ve got a seasoned local pro showing you the ropes, helping you avoid rookie mistakes, and giving you the confidence to actually enjoy building your business.

But here’s what really sets eXp apart: this isn’t just mentorship. It’s part of a bigger picture. eXp Realty gives new agents everything—support, training, tech, stock, and opportunity. And when you join with Smart Agent Alliance as your sponsor team? You’re stacking even more value on top.

Smart Agent Alliance runs meetings so you gain passive income. How awesome is that? It’s like free money.  Smart Agent Alliance also gives agents access to:

  • A done-for-you and hosted real estate attraction website
  • Social Agent Academy Pro ($10,500 value) for social media marketing
  • Weekly coaching sessions with top producers
  • Customizable lead funnels, email campaigns, and marketing templates
  • And more…

All free for agents who join through the Smart Agent Alliance sponsor line. Learn more about how eXp Realty and Smart Agent Alliance can help you scale your career. Not sure if eXp is the right fit for you? Take this quick quiz to find out if eXp is a good match, especially if support and systems matter to you.

Not sure how passive income grows?  You can play with the numbers using our exp realty revenue share calculator to see how much you could earn. Not sure how to become a real estate agent? We’ve got loads of helpful info on that too. When you join eXp Realty with Smart Agent Alliance as your sponsor, you’ll gain even more—free real estate training, agent attraction systems, and a supportive community that helps you scale faster. If you’re ready to launch your career with one of the top real estate brokerages in the USA, the right mentor and sponsor at eXp Realty can make all the difference.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the eXp Mentor Program?

The eXp Mentor Program pairs new and returning eXp Realty agents with a certified, local real estate mentor. It provides step-by-step guidance through your first three transactions, helping you build skills and confidence as a new real estate agent.

Who qualifies for the eXp Mentor Program?

Newly licensed real estate agents or those with fewer than three closed transactions in the past 12 months are automatically enrolled in the eXp Mentor Program when they join eXp Realty.

What does an eXp Mentor do?

An eXp mentor offers real estate mentoring by guiding new agents through transactions, teaching negotiation skills, and helping them manage clients. They ensure agents build a solid foundation in the real estate business.

What is the eXp Mentor Program commission split?

During the eXp mentor program, agents keep 60% of their commission. 10% goes to the mentor, 10% supports the mentorship program, and the remaining 20% counts toward eXp Realty’s standard cap.

How long does the eXp Mentor Program last?

The eXp Mentor Program typically lasts through your first three transactions. Most agents graduate in six months but can move faster depending on their sales activity.

Is eXp Realty the best real estate brokerage for new agents?

Many new agents choose eXp Realty because of its structured mentorship program, extensive training, and supportive real estate agent community. eXp Realty combines virtual brokerage flexibility with hands-on mentorship.

How do I find a real estate mentor at eXp Realty?

You don’t have to search for a mentor. eXp Realty automatically matches qualifying agents with certified mentors through its real estate mentorship program.

What’s the difference between an eXp mentor and an eXp sponsor?

An eXp mentor helps new agents with their first transactions. An eXp sponsor provides ongoing business coaching, agent attraction support, and access to free real estate training, like the tools offered by Smart Agent Alliance.

Does the eXp Mentor Program offer free real estate mentoring?

Yes, the eXp Mentor Program offers free real estate mentoring as part of joining eXp Realty. Agents pay a portion of their commission split, but there are no upfront costs for mentorship.

Why join eXp Realty as a new real estate agent?

New agents join eXp Realty for its mentor program, virtual brokerage platform, top real estate agent network, and revenue share model. It’s one of the best real estate brokerages for new agents.
